attributes.action: urge Central Bedfordshire Unitary Authority to hold LDF Task Force meetings in public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Central Bedfordshire Local Development Framework (LDF) Task Force is preparing a draft strategic development plan which will have far reaching consequences for all residents. The LDF Task Force is meeting in secret, preventing public scrutiny of the decision making process. These meetings should be in public, so local residents and electors can understand how the proposals in the draft plan have been formulated and on what evidence decisions have been based.
